Windlord/Trinity/Nightlight


Trinity  woke up as soon as Areotaur arrived and shouted "Uncle 
Aerotaur!!!" the little one  ranr towaRDS Aerotaur "How're you Uncle 
Aerotaur!!!?? Do you like play tag???? I wanna play!!!" 

Nightlight arrived some seconds before Aerotaur and she walked to the 
conference roon.

"Greetings Aerotaur, what happen with the ship??? said the male while 
he walked towards Aerotaur.
